6Valley - Your One-Stop Automotive Marketplace Solution

Why build when you can launch? 6Valley brings you an easy-to-manage online automotive marketplace solution. Control your entire business from a single dashboard & reach automobile enthusiasts across regions.

Get Started
Explore Free Demo

All Automotive Categories, Ready to Roll

6Valley delivers versatile automotive marketplace software for all industry players. From vehicle sales to spare parts, custom modifications to professional services - every automotive business finds its perfect fit!

Cars

Motorcycles

Auto Parts

Tires & Wheels

Accessories

Commercial Vehicles

Auto Care Products

    • Why Industry Leaders Choose 6Valley for Their Automotive Marketplace?

    Automobile Marketplace with Advanced Search & Filtration

    Car buyers have specific needs - from fuel type to trunk space. Our smart search and filtration help your autophile audience find what they want when they want it. Whether customers want only SUVs, electric cars, or specific parts, they can filter and pinpoint their choices without sifting through endless listings.

    Imagine a customer seeking a Mercedes-Benz luxury sedan. With our advanced search, they can quickly find the latest, top-rated, and best-selling ones. They also can filter by price range for a more tailored experience.

    Single & Multi-Vendor Supported Automotive Marketplace

    Start solo or build a network. 6Valley offers the flexibility you need to grow your vehicle marketplace online at your own pace.

    If you want, you can start as a single dealership. As you grow, you can easily switch to a multi-vendor model by adding dealers, parts suppliers, or service centers in different locations or vice versa.

    Each vendor gets a dedicated dashboard, while you keep complete central control. Perfect for those who aspire to grow from a local expert to an industry pioneer.

    Automobile Marketplace with Built-in SEO Power

    Take control of your site's search engine performance with our built-in SEO settings. Seamlessly manage robots txt directives, generate dynamic XML sitemaps, and track 404 errors in real time.

    Easily connect your website with different popular webmaster tools like Google Search Console, Bing Webmaster, Yandex Webmaster, and Baidu Webmaster. This way, you can manage your website’s visibility and indexing status for better search performance. Use the robots.txt editor to control which pages search engines can access.

    We've automated the technical heavy lifting so you can focus on what matters: getting found online.

    Online Automotive Marketplace with All Essential Panels

    Every great online marketplace for cars or auto parts needs perfect coordination between its key players. 6Valley equips you with panels tailored for admin, vendors, customers, and delivery drivers. This helps meet the unique needs of running an online automotive business. The admin panel provides full oversight of your marketplace. Vendors can independently list vehicles, parts, and accessories. It offers buyers a range of choices. Meanwhile, the customer app provides a tailored browsing experience. The deliveryman app helps keep moving automobiles and parts with real-time updates.

    Cross-Platform Supported Vehicle Marketplace Online

    Your customers can research cars, details, or auto parts on their phones during lunch. 6Valley’s automotive marketplace software offers a seamless experience across desktop, mobile, and tablet, making it accessible wherever customers are.

    This cross-platform compatibility ensures users can easily view and purchase auto parts and cars on their preferred device, whether they’re at home or on the go. By providing smooth functionality on all platforms, you maximize convenience and increase the likelihood of conversions.

    Retain Users through Online Automotive Marketplace

    Building a loyal customer base in the automotive industry means staying connected beyond the first sale. Our platform includes tools for customer lifecycle management through wallet and loyalty points along with promotions, notifications, etc.

    6Valley’s user retention features let you create exclusive flash deals, highlight a ‘Deal of the Day,’ and showcase special feature deals to capture attention.

    With these perks, your automotive marketplace can build lasting connections. This will ensure customers are excited to return.

    Seamless Third-Party Integrations in Automobile Marketplace

    Your auto parts and accessories online marketplace needs to work with industry-standard tools and services. Our platform lets you integrate smoothly with essential third-party services like top payment gateways, email & SMS services, social media, reCaptcha, Google Maps, etc. It helps you connect with the tools your business relies on to keep customer preferences in mind, maintain workflow efficiency, and deliver a complete service package.

    Start Your Automotive Marketplace Today!

    Get Started

    6valley Default Theme for Automotive Marketplace

    Drive your automotive marketplace forward with the 6Valley Default theme. Designed for automotive vendors, this theme combines a modern interface with easy navigation that appeals to car enthusiasts and parts shoppers alike.

    It offers an intuitive layout where users can easily browse vehicles, auto parts, or accessories. The streamlined design not only highlights listings beautifully but also focuses on performance and usability to enhance customer engagement and boost conversion rates.

    Empower Your Auto Marketplace with 6Valley’sAdvanced Features!

    Explore how 6Valley’s specialized features transform the automotive marketplace experience. Our platform delivers the perfect blend of powerful apps & panels, secure systems, and smart automation to help your marketplace thrive.

    • Admin Panel

    • User App

    • Vendor App

    • Deliveryman App

    Admin Panel

    Product Management

    Manage a wide range of automotive listings, from cars to parts and accessories with just a few taps. You can quickly add, edit, or remove items with detailed specs, images, and descriptions to give buyers an unmatched experience.

    Category Setup

    Build intuitive categories tailored to automotive needs - from new cars and used vehicles to auto parts and accessories. Create logical hierarchies like SUVs > Luxury SUVs > Model Year. It helps buyers find exactly what they're looking for.

    Brand Wise Products

    Showcase auto parts and vehicles by brand, making it simple for customers to browse through their preferred manufacturers. Perfect for organizing top automotive brands and providing a smoother search experience.

    Order Management

    Monitor, and handle customer orders on the vehicle marketplace from start to finish. Track order statuses, manage refunds, and coordinate deliveries to ensure smooth transactions and keep customers satisfied.

    Promotion Management

    Create targeted promotions for vehicles and auto parts like featured listings for premium vehicles, seasonal deals on accessories, or discounts on orders. Design time-sensitive promotions to boost sales & attract more buyers to the vehicle marketplace.

    Report & Analysis

    Get insights into your automotive marketplace statistics. Access detailed reports to track performance and identify trends. From popular vehicles to high-demand parts, these insights help refine your inventory & strategy for optimized growth.

    Explore Admin Demo

    User App

    Guest Login & Checkout

    Allow potential buyers to explore vehicle listings, compare prices, and view specifications without mandatory registration. Quick guest checkouts reduce cart abandonment and create a smooth buying experience.

    Multi-Language Support

    Welcome a diverse community of automobile buyers and sellers with multilingual support. Let users browse vehicles, read specifications & interact in their preferred language. It makes your automotive marketplace accessible to both local and international users.

    Multiple Payment Methods

    Provide secure and convenient payment choices for users, including digital payments, customer wallets, offline payments, and cash-on-delivery options. It provides flexibility for purchasing vehicles or parts.

    Share Media Files on Chat

    Improve buyer-seller communication through media file sharing in chat. Customers can easily share photos or videos to inquire about parts or vehicles. This helps to clarify details before purchasing.

    Multiple Deals & Coupons

    Draw in and keep customers on your vehicle marketplace online by offering deals and discounts on featured vehicles or parts. Strengthen loyalty using banners, coupons, flash deals, deal of the day, and featured deals.

    Multiple Delivery Addresses

    Let users add multiple delivery addresses, making it easy to send auto parts or vehicles to various locations. This ensures that the order arrives precisely where they are needed whether at home, work, or directly to an emergency place.

    Explore User App Demo

    Seller App

    Easy Vendor Registration

    Automotive vendors like car dealers, private vendors, and auto parts vendors can quickly register and start listing vehicles, parts, or accessories with ease. This simple onboarding process allows them to focus on sales rather than complex setup steps.

    Vendor Wallet

    Vendors on your automobile marketplace can track earnings and manage transactions securely through an integrated wallet system. It lets them view detailed payment histories and manage transactions efficiently.

    Order Management

    Vendors can efficiently track, process, and manage customer orders to ensure a smooth fulfillment process. Real-time order tracking allows them to handle inquiries and deliver vehicles or automobile components on time.

    Product Management

    Empower vendors to manage their vehicle listings and auto parts inventory efficiently. They can update stock levels, adjust prices, and categorize items such as used & brand new vehicles or parts for organized and efficient sales.

    Low Stock Alerts

    Prevent lost sales by automated alerts to vendors when their vehicle, auto parts, or accessories inventory runs low. These alerts allow vendors to restock in time and keep popular items available.

    Coupon Management

    Vendors can create special offers and manage coupons to increase sales on specific items like car parts, accessories, or vehicles. It attracts more buyers and encourages repeat customers.

    Explore Vendor App Demo

    Deliveryman App

    Quick Login

    Delivery partners can skip lengthy registrations as admins create and verify accounts’ login credentials directly. Delivery personnel then use these credentials to access the app instantly, ready to manage deliveries without setup delays.

    Order Delivery Management

    Let delivery persons efficiently manage vehicle transport assignments and auto parts deliveries by tracking multiple deliveries, updating status in real-time, and coordinating with sellers and buyers for smooth handovers.

    Active Status

    With a toggle switch, delivery personnel can update their availability. It allows them to indicate when they're ready for new vehicle transport assignments or local parts delivery tasks. This helps to maintain efficient service coverage across your network.

    Live Chat

    Connect delivery partners instantly with buyers, sellers, and support teams through integrated chat. They can coordinate pickup times, discuss special handling requirements, and resolve any delivery challenges in real time.

    Deliveryman Wallet

    All earnings from deliveries are stored in the wallet automatically. This way delivery personnel to manage income and access transaction history easily and securely anytime they want along with the withdraw request option.

    Earning Statement

    Deliverymen can view detailed earning statements with itemized breakdowns, and filters based on today, this week, and this month. It helps them track their income over time and manage finances effortlessly.

    Explore Deliveryman App Demo

    Drive Your Profits with Dynamic Revenue Streams

    Expand your automotive marketplace’s revenue with 6Valley. Apply vendor-specific commissions, implement customizable shipping charges, and gain profits through in-house parts or vehicle sales - all designed to grow your business effectively.

    Vendor-wise Commission

    Order or Category-wise Shipping

    In-house Product Selling

    Tech-Driven Automotive Marketplace Built for the Future

    6Valley’s automotive marketplace platform is built with the latest and most adaptable technology. It ensures your online auto platform runs smoothly and efficiently on any device or operating system. Our solution provides reliable performance and smooth cross-platform integration for an exceptional experience.

    Technology

    Time to see what our clients are saying about 6Valley!

    "When I first dreamed of creating a leading used car marketplace, many said it was impossible. But with 6Valley, we made it happen. Since launching, customer traffic has grown significantly. I’m now reaching more customers than ever. Grateful for a reliable system that has transformed my marketplace!"

    • Seamless Setup & Personalized Experience

    Get your automotive marketplace up and running with 6Valley’s expert installation and customization services. Our smooth setup process gets you online fast, while our personalization services ensure your platform is tailored exactly to your vision.

    Quick Setup & Launch

    Count on us to get your 6Valley solution ready for launch with an expert installation and setup process.

    Installation Plans

    Customize Every Detail

    Have a brilliant idea? Work with our experts to customize your 6Valley solution just the way you want.

    Request Customization

    Frequently Asked Questions

    1. Is it possible to add customer reviews and ratings on the vehicle marketplace online?

    Yes, 6Valley supports customer reviews and ratings, allowing buyers to give feedback, which helps build trust and transparency.

    2. Does 6Valley include SEO tools to help my marketplace get noticed?

    Yes, 6Valley includes built-in SEO settings such as sitemaps, webmaster tools, and 404 logs, helping your automotive marketplace site rank higher on search engines.

    3. How long does it take to launch an automotive marketplace?

    The timeline can differ based on the complexity and required elements of your business. Opting for a pre-built solution like 6Valley can speed up your launch compared to a custom build.

    4. What features can I explore in the 6Valley demo?

    You can explore the complete eCommerce ecosystem, including vendor and customer experiences, order management, promotional tools, and various modern UI themes like Default, Aster, and Lifestyle.

    Start Your Automotive Marketplace Today!

    Get Started
